file_insights.purpose: Populate initial features, plans, and plan-feature mappings for a QR Menu SaaS platform

patterns_discovered: Dynamic permission system with feature-based plan configuration
Flexible feature mapping using boolean and limit types
Incremental feature enablement across plan tiers
gotchas_discovered: Hardcoded plan logic despite comments about avoiding hardcoded checks
Potential complexity in maintaining plan_features mappings
High cognitive load in managing granular feature permissions
Manually crafted feature-to-plan mappings instead of programmatic generation

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Create seed data for features and plans

recommendations: Implement a data generation script to reduce manual mapping complexity
Create a validation mechanism to ensure plan features are consistently applied
Consider using an ORM or migration tool for more maintainable database seeding
Add comments explaining the rationale behind specific feature limitations per plan
Develop a feature flag system that can dynamically interpret these seed configurations
